@maroonylife magnet files take a while longer to start downloading. Have you tried waiting it out?

solved. watched some vieos and read some blogs and apparently, the way to go is patience. (I'm using utorrent) Simply click on the magnet link, you won't see any files show up that's normal. And let utorrent try to download it. It's supposed to get to a normal speed in about 3 minutes. After that it's normal torrent.

Just click on the magnet link, and click yes on utorrent, you can right click>don't download the files you don't want later on. system works :)

You're not going to see the same list of tiles as you did with .torrents, but if you check the "Files" link on the torrents page (like this one) you'll see a list of what will be DLed, then you can de/select what you do/n't want after about 2 seconds of DLing, as you will have the list in your torrenting program.
